verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You are holy newline (You are holy) newline You are mighty newline (You are mighty) newline You are worthy newline (You are worthy) newline Worthy of Praise newline (Worthy of praise)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I will follow newline (I will follow) newline I will listen newline (I will listen) newline I will love You newline (I will love You) newline All of my days newline (all of my days)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I will sing to newline (You're the Lord of Lords) newline And worship newline (You're the King of Kings) newline The King who newline (You are mighty God) newline Is worthy newline (Lord of everything)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I will love and newline (You're Emmanuel) newline Adore Him newline (You're the Great I Am) newline I will bow down newline (You're the Prince of Peace) newline before Him newline (Who is the Lamb)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: I will sing to newline (You're the living God) newline And worship newline (You're my saving grace) newline The King who newline (You will reign forever) newline Is worthy newline (You are ancient of days)

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: I will love and newline (You are alpha, omega) newline Adore Him newline (Beginning and end) newline I will bow down newline (You're my Savior, Messiah) newline Before Him newline (Redeemer and friend)

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: You're my Prince of Peace newline and I will live my life for You
